Frontsize 3.0.0 beta

A CSS generator framework built to build
a professional front-end and ease your life.

what Release 3.0.0 beta

Main features

  • Migration capable

    You can totally custom your grid rules and override other frameworks to unleash
    the extreme Frontsize flexibility.

  • CSS lint test proof

    At the moment the only one front-end framework which passes CSS lint tests, to
    let you do the best quality work.

  • Fallbacks

    Do you need fallback compatibility? You can enable Frontsize features for IE,
    activate / deactivate browser prefixes, or use fallback compatibility mixins.

Would you like to know more?

  • HDTV readability

    There are mixins written to make text readable for TV distance.

  • Just CSS

    This is a pure totally flexible CSS generator front-end framework, you choose the JS libs.

  • Widget modularity

    No more rule conflicts and best optimization on loading selection.

  • Theme ready

    Create beautiful themes with all the variants you need.

About

Frontsize is written in LESS
by Vittorio Vittori

Frontsize is sponsored
by Ideato Srl

SASS porting
by Alessandro Minoccheri
